snippet: The port of Gioia Tauro, one of the busiest in Europe, was picked because of its facilities for transferring cargo ship-to-ship.
abstract: Southern Italian port of Gioia Tauro, one of busiest in Europe, will be transfer point for hundreds of tons of Syrian chemical weapons en route to their neutralization at sea.
lead_paragraph: The port of Gioia Tauro, one of the busiest in Europe, was picked because of its facilities for transferring cargo ship-to-ship.

headline.main: Italian Port Chosen as Transfer Point for Syrian Chemicals
headline.print_headline: Syria: Chemical Arms to Italian Port

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
keywords.name: organizations
